MC Paint

Friendly, local and affordable painting and decorating service for Frome and the surrounding area by Martin Cox!

All jobs considered!

Whether it is just one room, a whole home or some old windows in need of TLC, we can accomodate all painting and decorating work! Just get in touch to arrange a quote.

Local to the area for over 30 years!

I love Frome and have lived here for most of my life. I have always been passionate about painting and decorating and in the last few years I have turned that passion into a business.
